Already facing severe fuel shortages,generator use has further depleted supplies. In the next few hours more generators will stop at hospitals because fuel is running out. Making matters even worse is that internet & cell service makes communications increasingly difficult.

Harriet Tubman lived her life as a fighter. She escaped from slavery in her twenties, but returned many times, risking her safety to lead her family and other slaves to freedom. On Harriet Tubman Day, we honor her bravery. #WomensHistoryMonth

I fight for an America where no person is afraid to go to a school, a movie theater, a church — anywhere — for fear of being a victim of the next mass shooting. Let’s pass universal background checks and renew the assault weapons ban. We can’t wait any longer.

The powerful special interests who control this country are going to spend a lot of money to try to defeat us. But we have something they don’t have: the power of the people.

They understand that. When we talk about the 1%, they are 1%. We are the 99%.
Democracy is about serious debate over public policy, not having a president who is a pathological liar and who has told thousands of blatant lies since he has been in office.

This Administration continues to deny fact when it comes to climate change. They continue to deny science. They would rather have us buy science fiction than tackle this imminent threat to our planet. Climate change is happening and turning a blind eye won’t make it go away.

If massive amounts of aid isn’t delivered very soon, I fear we are headed for an unprecedented catastrophe.

People across America are waking up this morning grumpy at losing an hour because of “springing forward”  to daylight saving time. 

This week I once again filed my bill to end this “obsolete, confusing and unhealthy” practice.  https://www.washingtonpost.com/science/2019/03/08/springing-forward-daylight-saving-time-is-obsolete-confusing-unhealthy-critics-say/

4/5
As of 8:30pm last night 17 deaths have been reported in hospitals due to lack of electricity. The true number is higher. 
Patients on life support,in neonatal ICU have died & more will die in coming hours. Dialysis patients face certain death if they don’t get services soon.

But the reason we’re not excited by it is because we live in a society where if you don’t have a job, you are left to die.
